name: David:Beast Wrestler
description:
An intentionally silly fighting game set in the world of the Old Testament,  inspired by a passage where David boasts of his ability to fight beasts bare-handed while still a shepherd and not King.

To get started, select (Keyboard) and (C)olor after starting the game and then press P to play. Move using the arrow keys. Once in the game, you can pause by pressing P and unpause by moving.
